sourcesContent:
const ExperienceData = [
  {
    id: 1,
    jobtitle: "Full-Stack Software Developer",
    companyname: "The Digital Academy",
    worktype: "Full-time",
    duration: "June 2022 - May 2023",
    location: "Johannesburg, Auckland Park",
    responsibility: [
      `Designing wireframes using Figma.`,
      `Webpage design using HTML5 and CSS3.`,
      `Responsive website design using Bootstrap and functionality using Javascript.`,
      `Developing backend API using Node.js`,
      `Creating tables using SQL and connecting database to Node.js API.`,
      `Hosting the website online and presenting the application to management.`,
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    jobtitle: "Sustainability Research Intern",
    companyname: "ImpactVest",
    worktype: "Full-time",
    duration: "March 2022 - May 2022",
    location: "Remote",
    responsibility: [
      `Studying and researching how companies incorporate esg(economic, social and governance.`,
      `Conducting research in the sustainability of organisations, corporates and companies to drive impact investing in sustainability.`,
      `Research focusing on the 5 stages of sustainability.`,
      `Researching how companies impliment the three lens of sustainability(strategic, operational and cultural) in the sustainability stage 1.`,
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    jobtitle: "Data Scientist Intern",
    companyname: "ExploreAI Academy",
    worktype: "Full-time",
    duration: "January 2021 - December 2021",
    location: "Woodstock, Cape Town",
    responsibility: [
      `Python programming fundamentals.`,
      `Using Python for Exploratory Data Analysis`,
      `Data extraction and cleaning.`,
      `Getting predictions from data using machine learning models`,
      `Using SQL to extract data from databases`,
      `Deploying and presenting the machine learning models`,
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    jobtitle: "Data Science Trainee",
    companyname: "Deviare",
    worktype: "Full-time",
    duration: "June 2020 - January 2021",
    location: "Johannesburg, Gauteng",
    responsibility: [
      `Python programming fundamentals.`,
      `Python for Data Science.`,
      `Machine Learning and Deep Learning.`,
      `Introduction to Statistical essentials and data analytics.`,
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    jobtitle: "Supplementary Instructor(SI) Leader",
    companyname: "University of Limpopo",
    worktype: "Part-time",
    duration: "August 2018 - October 2018",
    location: "Polokwane, Limpopo",
    responsibility: [
      `Assisting first year students with applied mathematics.`,
      `Conducting classes on the weekend to discuss the challenges they faced during the lecture.`,
    ],
  }
];

const EducationData = [
  {
    name: "University of Limpopo",
    status: "B.Sc Mathematical Sciences",
    year: "2019",
  },
  {
    name: "Mbilwi Secondary School",
    status: "Matric Certificate",
    year: "2003 - 2007",
  }
];

const CertificationData = [
  {
    name: "HTML&CSS Tutorial and Projects Course 2022 (Flexbox&Grid)",
    source: "Udemy",
    date: "Issued Aug 2022 · No Expiration Date",
    creditUrl:
      "https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-085c1d75-0759-4543-b21b-16b2350169a6/",
  },
  {
    name: "GitHub Ultimate: Master Git and GitHub - Beginner to Expert",
    source: "Udemy",
    date: "Issued Jun 2022 · No Expiration Date",
    creditUrl:
      "https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-ec1a7b4c-458c-4478-9425-1bb11ad8fa4b/",
  },
  {
    name: "The Complete Agile Scrum Fundamentals Course",
    source: "Udemy",
    date: "Issued Jun 2022 · No Expiration Date",
    creditUrl:
      "https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-fb19899d-bc63-442d-9d41-1ee56f2bcb2a/",
  },
  {
    name: "Learning Python Programming Masterclass",
    source: "Udemy",
    date: "Issued Feb 2022 · No Expiration Date",
    creditUrl:
      "https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-40989e94-3ad6-4568-93bc-175796e825af/",
  },
  {
    name: "Complete SQL and Databases Bootcamp: Zero to Mastery [2021]",
    source: "Udemy",
    date: "Issued Sep 2021 · No Expiration Date",
    creditUrl:
      "https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-c7140a48-9851-45f6-b69a-0adceafd3f58/",
  },
  {
    name: "The Complete JavaScript Course 2020:Build Real Projects",
    source: "Udemy",
    date: "Issued Oct 2020 · No Expiration Date",
    creditUrl:
      "https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-b3c909aa-d1c2-4379-884e-6bf701697986/",
  },
];

export { ExperienceData, EducationData, CertificationData };
